Posts.EditableText: Hi. First off, I'm new to this and I'm just starting on my first game. Anyway, as I've been reading some of the things on this site, I've read that you can sell your games if you choose to do so and what I want to know is how you do that? I'd appreciate someone telling me.
Posts.HTML: Hi. First off, I'm new to this and I'm just starting on my first game. Anyway, as I've been reading some of the things on this site, I've read that you can sell your games if you choose to do so and what I want to know is how you do that? I'd appreciate someone telling me.

Posts.EditableText: i am also new on this forum and don't have much information about this i hope some one come and give better and informative reply for your question stay blessed

Posts.EditableText:
There's nothing to stop you selling your own work!  But be sure not to use anyone else's brands/trademarks etc.

put your product on steam, itch.io or Google Play or the Apple Store.
